name: dune-simulation
short_description:
Written as a module in DUNE Numerics framework, the library aims to provide the physicists, engineers and anyone who is interested with a framework to simulate various multiphysics systems like electronic devices among others. 

The framework has a small core that basically provides functions and utilies to manage the geometry and data of the problem domain. Various solvers can be plugged in to use the data to solve for whatever systems are needed.  

A user is basically gives various configuration data about the problem domain and subdomains , from which appropriate grids are created and then the user is provided with an object with functions to the manage the domain and various subdomains of the problem and to faciliatate management and operations on data.
